mapper.insert: insert into hz_webupload (id, creator, create_time, file_name, file_md5, `state`, chunk_num, chunk_now, file_path, last_update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chunkNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chunkNow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update hz_webupload set creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_md5 = #{fileMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chunk_num = #{chunkNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chunk_now = #{chunkNow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, creator, create_time, file_name, file_md5, `state`, chunk_num, chunk_now, file_path, last_update_time from hz_webupload where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, creator, create_time, file_name, file_md5, `state`, chunk_num, chunk_now, file_path, last_update_time from hz_webupload
